item.title: Neo4j Study
item.description:
Installation Neo4j service is not installed D:\Tools

eo4j-community-5.5.0un Starting Neo4j. Neo4j service is not installed Unable to start. See user log for details. Run with '--verbose' for a more detailed error message. Install neo4j service neo4j.bat windows-service install Start neo4j D:\Tools
eo4j-community-5.5.0 in>neo4j.bat start Directories in use: home: D:\Tools
